message: Bob, I'm offering you this exceptional product for $1500000. I believe it's a fair price given its unique value. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product is unique, but based on my assessment, I am only willing to pay $900000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your perspective. While $900000 is below my minimum acceptable price, I'm willing to be flexible.  I'm prepared to drop my price to $1300000.  This represents a significant concession, and I hope we can reach an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to be flexible, Alice. After considering your latest offer, I am willing to pay $1100000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
